title: Relic shield
body:
You know what i love when i have a support with relic shield?

That it's a thresh and he isn't even using it, still won lane, it was just hard because they had an alistar also with relic shield that knew how to use it.

I brought this up in the end game and here is the conversation

JasonWazza: hey thresh
Thresh: hey
JasonWazza: never ever buy relic shield again
JasonWazza: you didn't use it once
Thresh: bahaha why
Thresh: u never pinged for me
Thresh: communication is tha key
JasonWazza: i shouldn't have to


IF YOU ARE TAKING RELIC SHIELD, IT IS YOUR JOB TO TAKE THE MINIONS, NOT YOUR ADC'S JOB TO PING MINIONS FOR YOU TO TAKE.

I fucking slammed my head into my desk when he said this, because for the first five or so minutes i was leaving CS clearly open for him, and he just wasn't taking them.

The only reason communication should be needed regarding Relic shield is the following

Support: hey can you try and leave a few minions for my relic shield.


/Rant

Honestly this game just pissed me off more cause of lack of communication due to the obvious premade, and the fact that i was against Ali with relic shield who was just healing up all my poke with his E/Relic shield.

replies.body: The difference is my rage makes sense, fact is he may as well have gone for the coin to start the game rather then the shield, he did nothing with the shield anyway.
Yeah no i was making sure i got the minions to around 70-80 HP and then changing minions for the first 5 minutes of laning phase, then i gave up, and just started CSing.
You said he's autos count as melee. You mean ranged right?
